com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.emailserver.greenmail

Class GreenmailMailServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.AbstractServer
      • com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.emailserver.AbstractMailServer
        • com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.emailserver.greenmail.GreenmailMailServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MailServer, com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Server

    public final class GreenmailMailServer
extends AbstractMailServer
    Encapsulates the GreenMail mail servers allowing them to be controlled by a monitor.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews
